comment: A finite abelian group whose order factors into relatively prime integers, itself "factors" into two subgroups ` K , L ` that have trivial intersection and whose product is the whole group. Lemma 6.1C.2 of [Shapiro], p. 199. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
